commandDescription: Deletes references from csv files that don't contain a translation
sfXmlFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for xml sources. Default: '%s'
esCsvFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input csv object translation. Default: '%s'
inputFlagDescription: Specify an object translation. Example: MyObject-en_US
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
